Üi: Pichpich.
 Ilelkawün: isiken ka ütran.
 Wif: mari kiñe cms.
Üi: Chedüf.
 Ilelkawün: müngelkechi isiken.
 Wif: mari epu cms.
Üi: Meñkutoki.
 Ilelkawün: müngelkechi isiken.
 Wif: mari meli ka mari kechu cms.
Üi: Chiriw.
 Ilelkawün: müngelkechi ütran.
 Wif: mari meli ka mari kechu cms.
Üi: Killkill.
 Ilelkawün : üñüm, isiken, koneku, filu.
 Wif: epu mari ka epu mari kiñe cms.
Üi: Menku Kashka.
 Ilelkawün: isiken ka piru.
 Wif: mari epu ka mari küla cms.
Üi: Püdko.
 Ilelkawün: isiken ka fünmamüll.
 Wif: epu mari kiñe cms.
Üi: Wiyu.
 Ilelkawün: isiken, ütran, pewün fünmamüll.
 Wif: mari kechu cms.
Üi: Pillmaykeñ.
 Ilelkawün: müngelkechi isiken.
 Wif: mari küla ka mari meli cms.
Üi: Chiw-chiw.
 Ilelkawün: ütran ka isiken.
 Wif: mari küla ka mari meli cms.
Üi: Pichi Pinda.
 Ilelkawün: miski rayen.
 Wif: mari kiñe cms.
Üi: Platero.
 Ilelkawün: ütran ka isiken.
 Wif: mari kechu cms.
Üi:Tregül.
 Ilelkawüm: ütran ka isiken.
 Wif:küla mari kechu ka küla mari regle cms.
Üi: Kamtrü.
 Ilelkawün: müngelkechi isiken. 
 Wif: mari aylla ka epu mari cms.
Üi: Rayadito.
 Ilelkawün: müngelkechi isiken. 
 Wif: mari küla ka mari kechu cms.
Üi: Tapaculo.
 Ilelkawün: isiken, llalliñ, yupe, pichi filkuñ.
 Wif: mari püra ka mari aylla cms.
ÜI: Tucuquere.
 Ilelkawün: pu koneku, zewü, filu ka kake pichi kulliñ.
 Wif: meli mari püra ka kechu mari cms.
Üi: Turco.
 Ilelkawün: isiken, düllwi ka piru.
 Wif: epu mari küla ka epu mari meli cms.
Üi: Yal.
 Ilelkawün: müngelkechi ütran, pichi fun ka piru.
 Wif: mari püra ka mari aylla cms.
Üi: Wilki.
 Ilelkawün: piru, fotra kulliñ, afülechi fün.
 Wif: mari aylla cms.

 Ilelkawün: müngelkechi ütran.
 Wif: epu mari küla ka epu mari meli cms.
Üi: Rakiñ.
 Ilelkawün: müngelkechi isiken.
 Wif: epu mari kiñe cms.
Üi: Pilpilén.
 Ilelkawün: ko kulliñ ka fptra kulliñ.
 Wif: meli mari küla ka meli mari meli cms.
Üi: Füdü.
 Ilelkawün: ütran ka isiken.
 Wif: epu mari aylla ka küla mari cms.
Üi: Pitotoy Chico.
 Ilelkawün: isiken ka piru.
 Wif: epu mari kechu cms.
Üi: Gorrión.
 Ilelkawün: isiken ka ütran.
 Wif: mari kayü ka mari regle cms.
Üi: Cometocino de Gay.
 Ilelkawün: ütran ka isiken. 
 Wif: mari kechu ka mari kayü cms.
Üi: Futa Pinda.
 Ilelkawün: miski rayen ka isiken.

 Wif: epu mari regle ka epu mari püra cms.

Scientific Name: Anairetes Parulus. 
 Feeding: insects and seeds. 
 Length: 11 cms.
Scientific Name: Troglodytes Redon Chilensis. 
 Feeding: insects. 
 Length: 12 cms.
Scientific Name: Zonatrichia Capensis Chilensis. 
 Feeding: basically insectivorous. 
 Length: 14 to 15 cms.
Scientific Name: Sicalis Luteola Luteiventris. 
 Feeding: mainly seeds. 
 Length: 14 to 15 cms.
Scientific Name: Glaucidium Nanum. 
 Feeding: birds, insects, small mammals and reptiles. 
 Length: 20 to 21 cms.
Scientific Name: Lessonia Rufa. 
 Feeding: insects and larvae. 
 Length: 12 to 13 cms.
Scientific Name: Xolmis Pyrope. 
 Feeding: mainly insects and wild fruits. 
 Length: 21 cms.
Scientific Name: Elaenia Albiceps Chilensis. 
 Feeding: mainly insects, but also seeds and tree shoots. 
 Length: 15 cms.
Scientific Name: Tachycineta Meyeni. 
 Feeding: mainly insects. 
 Length: 13 to 14 cms.
Scientific Name: Carduelis Barbata. 
 Feeding: seeds and insects. 
 Length: 13 to 14 cms.
Scientific Name: Sephanoides. 
 Feeding: pollen and nectar of flowers. 
 Length: 11 cms.
Scientific Name: Phrygilus Alaudinus. 
 Feeding: seeds and invertebrates. 
 Length: 15 cms.
Scientific Name: Vanellus chilensis.
 Feeding: Insects and seeds.
 Length:35 to 37 cms.
Scientific Name: Phytotoma Rara. 
 Feeding: fruits and insects.
 Length: 19 to 20 cms.
Scientific Name: Aphrastura Spinicauda. 
 Feeding: insects.
 Length: 13 to 15 cms.
Scientific Name: Sceriorchilus Albicollis. 
 Feeding: insects, arachnids and small reptiles. 
 Length: 18 to 19 cms.
Scientific Name: Bubo Magellanicus. 
 Feeding: rabbits, mice, snakes and other small animals. 
 Length: 48 to 50 cms.
Scientific Name: Pteroptochos Megapodius. 
 Feeding: insects and worms. 
 Length: 23 to 24 cms.
Scientific Name: Phrygilus Fruticeli. 
 Feeding: mainly seeds, also small fruits and invertebrates. 
 Length: 18 to 19 cms.
Scientific Name: Turdus Falcklandi Magellanicus. 
 Feeding: worms, snails and some ripe fruits. 
 Length: 19 cms.
Scientific Name: Metriopelia Melanoptera. 
 Feeding: mainly seeds. 
 Length: 23 to 24 cms.
Scientific Name: Upucerthia Dumetaria. 
 Feeding: insects. 
 Length: 21 cms.
Scientific Name: Haematopus Palliatus. 
 Feeding: oysters and molluscs. 
 Length: 43 to 44 cms.
Scientific Name: Nothoprocta Perdicaria. 
 Feeding: seeds and insects. 
 Length: 29 to 30 cms.
Scientific Name: Tringa Flavipes. 
 Feeding: insects, larvae and small fish.
 Length: 25 cms.
Scientific Name: Passer Domesticus. 
 Feeding: insects and seeds. 
 Length: 16 to 17 cms.
Scientific Name: Phrygilus Gay. 
 Feeding:fruits, seeds and invertebrates. 
 Length: 15 to 16 cms.
Scientific Name: Patagona Gigas. 
 Feeding: nectar of flowers and insects. 
 Length: 21 to 22 cms.
Scientific Name: Agriornis Livida. 
 Feeding: insects, toads, lizards. 
 Length: 27 to 28 cms.
Scientific Name: Himantopus Mexicanus Melanurus. 
 Feeding: Insects and some invertebrates. 
 Length: 42 cms.
Scientific Name: Diuca diuca. 
 Feeding: mainly seeds. 
 Length: 17 to 18 cms.
Scientific Name: Scytalopus Magellanicus. 
 Length: 11 cms.
Scientific Name: Colaptes Pitius. 
 Feeding: insects and larvae. 
 Length: 32 to 34 cms.
Scientific Name: Pseudasthenes Humicola. 
 Feeding: mainly insects. 
 Length: 16 to 17 cms.
Scientific Name: Systellura Longirostris Bifasciatus. 
 Feeding: based entirely on insects. 
 Length: 24 to 25 cms.
Scientific Name: Sturnella Loyca. 
 Feeding: insects, seeds and fruits. 
 Length: 26 to 28 cms.
Scientific Name: Geositta Rufipennis Fasciata. 
 Feeding: insects and seeds. 
 Length: 16 cms.
Scientific Name: Mimus thenca.
 Feeding: insects and worms.
 Length: 28 cms.
Scientific Name: Curaenus Curaenus.
 Feeding: insects and fruits.
 Length: 28 cms.
Scientific Name: Milvago Chimango.
 Feeding: insects, worms, toads and scavenger on occasion.
 Length: 37 to 40 cms.

Scientific Name: Phrygilus Patagonicus.
 Feeding: seeds, fruits and nectar.
 Length: 14 a 16 cms.
Scientific Name: Leptasthenura Aegithaloides.
 Feeding: insects.
 Length: 15 a 18 cms.
Scientific Name: Zenaida Auriculata.
 Feeding: seeds.
 Length: 23 a 28 cms.
Scientific Name: Colorhamphus Parvirostris.
 Feeding: insects.
 Length: 25 cms.

 Feeding: insects and worms.

 Feeding: seeds.
 Length: 18 cms.
Scientific Name: Asio Flammeus.
 Feeding: small mammalls.
 Length: 36 cms.
Scientific Name: Picoides Lignarius.
 Feeding: insects and worms.

 Feeding: sea ​​fleas, crustaceans and larvae.
 Length: 45 cms.
Scientific Name: Rynchops Niger Cinerascens.
 Feeding: small fish and insects.
 Length: 46 cms.
Scientific Name: Larus Dominicanus.
 Feeding: fish, shellfish and crustaceans.
 Length: 18 cms.
Scientific Name: Phalacrocorax Brasilianus.
 Feeding: fish and crustaceans.
 Length: 58 a 73 cms.
Scientific Name: Larus Pipixcan.
 Feeding: insects y worms.
 Length: 38 a 43 cms.
Scientific Name: Cinclodes Patagonicus.
 Feeding: invertebrates.
 Length: 22 cms.
Scientific Name: Schelorchilus Rubecula.
 Feeding: insects and invertebrates.
 Length: 18 a 19 cms.
Scientific Name: Molathrus Bonariensis.
 Feeding: insects and seeds.
 Length: 19 a 20 cms.
